insert.foreach: insert into purchase (purnum, purdate, isbn, remdate, id, price, ordernumber, purcount) values(P_PN_SEQ.nextval, sysdate, #{item.isbn}, #{item.remdate}, #{item.id}, #{item.price}, #{item.ordernumber}, #{item.purcount})

mapper.select: select genre.gname, sum(purchase.purcount) price from booklist inner join purchase on booklist.isbn = purchase.isbn left outer join genre on booklist.gnumber = genre.gnumber group by genre.gname

select R isbn, price,purnum,bookname,purdate,purcount from( select rownum R , B.isbn,B.bookname,B.price, P.purnum,P.purdate,P.purcount from booklist B inner join purchase P on B.isbn = P.isbn where P.id = #{id} order by P.purdate desc) where R between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(purchase.ordernumber) from booklist inner join purchase on booklist.isbn = purchase.isbn where purchase.id = #{id}
